twitch_info.title: Stream vom 07.02.24 - Mario's Evil Level, Seek the Discrepancy

1.title: Twitch Recap 2023
1.description: This user bled purple like it was their job, and was one of the most engaged members of Twitch in 2023!

message.body: this certainly looks like a hack
again
hi
lol
the muncher are still off
oh yeah the teeth
maybe that was it
literally unplayable
also 1 line yoshi paw
oh yeah definitely the teeth why they looked off
and use it for only 1 level
maybe that's an artistic decision
Wtf
Oh thats a 2010 hack?
I thought it was another hack like the last pit that got rejected
Level (2010) - 2024 Remaster
so what is visibility mode actually meant to do
Looks as fun as Moltov Mario
gl gl
"Loser √ó 6" ‚Üê I guess that's one way of naming your death counter.
visibility mode = the level isn't pitch black
oh yeah those were all the same tile originally
"are they fake" is not a nice thing to say
What isn't a nice thing to say? Twitch censored it Kappa
good block
and this is why note blocks should give you 127 speed.
Also, been very very "stuck" on my pit hack
Very slow progress lately
just don't get as stuck as me with my puzzle hack.
Nah i was able to make a jump last week
at least I have a good excuse for now.
biob's yoshi puzzle really needs some better protection against stupid breaks.
Yeah, the Ice sections are so difficult to make, because im using like the most obscure things i find on them
oh god ice.
Ice sections are late game in this case, like the 6/7 of the hack
how does ice even work?
wait what do you mean it's only 2 more weeks
nobody knows.
i know what you mean but where did the time go
Snow sections* would be a better way to put it
great that's 1 week for room 3 and 1 week for room 4.
i thought it would be like 3 at least
rip
"every 60 seconds in africa a minute passes"
Snow just for aesthetic, because only like 2 tricks actually are relates to slippery physics
armageddon has exactly 1 trick with slipperiness
The duck run
"duck run" lmao
what an amazing pun-name for that obstacle.
also much more descriptive that my name for it.
Lmao
it's visible if you ctrl+f2 in LM
My slippery trick is an optimization trick
to bad the snes has no ctrl key.
"blocks act as based on their palette, not their graphics tiles" ‚Üê not asm nor anybody needs it.
Also there is only one ghost house room left for me to build
Wtf lmao
can we get a pit hack with blocks like these?
would look so whack.
WoDM 2
it doesn't have ot be super hard, just kinda silly.
good savestate·µÄ·¥π
it's EOR #$80
WoDM2 would be World of pussyish moves
What do the golden blocks even do?
Wold of wholesome moves
"visibility"
Bruh
invisibility mode when?
invisibility mode: everything is the same tile, even air
Its not invisible! Its just the same color as the background, so it looks invisible!
"the invisible pit" a hack made to spite youtubers.
they should add an extra keyword to hackjam every year.
so "questionable pit hackjam" next year.
The entire hack is offscreen
Not like you cant just camera hack, but its all offscreen
I thought about doing that.
Oh thats true
'cause you have to fight getting pushed to the side.
questionable hackjam two
I almost included a screen pressure with cape in my cape room
(offscreen above / below is much less interesting)
(funny to call it "my cape room" when there are two)
Get the +10 speed from that vine and you're fine
Ah thr golden blocks aren't solid
I Keep forgetting about that
FAIL
why the fire bubble angry
Cuz theres no lava
it just really hates buoyancy.
would be funny if the invisible coin blocks were more visible than the brown blocks.
Invisible blocks more visible than visibility mode blocks
Pswitch
You mean MK switch?
asm nobody needs: visible invisible block ‚Äì visible until hit, then it becomes solid and invisible.
Not asm also?
I want a version with a custom bounce sprite.
replace unused note block with the solid invisible block
it should only be solid once hit from below
similar to an invisible coin block.
use the invisible unused note block
that one is already used for invisible cement blocks.
like in armageddon with the cement block no?
ah
honestly some "abitrary invisible block" asm would be nice, i.e. an "invisible map16-=0x100 block, that uses a bounce sprite"
You have to climb an entire vertical room with fish RNG
time to biob the platform up to the pipe.
it's possible so it must be intended
Nice pswitch clip on the pipe from distance
vanilla edit rooms?
Classic 2010 hacks for ya
oh so the yellow lines do do something
"almost there" sounds like pit hack intro message.
Oh the hack has an overworld that isn't just Yoshi Island
the reserve mushroom you don't even have now that there's counter break
Great
should desynced the vanilla munchers to make it consistent tbh
The  muncher is invisible cuz they didn't want to put a fluncher there
They built that part of the room before adding the different muncher blocks Kappa
MORE visible mode when?
Yeah you cant even just go on the GFX and change it
how is the visibility mode actually implemented? is it different levels based on the selection?
just change the 8x8 tiles?
(the ones used by the animation.)
so you don't have to fiddle with the animations.
Hello HF, hope you are doing well today!
...what?
not with that attitude
Oh
it makes sense, but it sounds wild to me that exanimation pulls from hardcoded GFX files.
Maybe the intended is using the pswitch
ah so vanilla animations are different?
you can't edit vanilla animations either, you can just disable it entirely iirc

@TheBiob I had some help with asm, but basically, you are right. Whether Original or Visibility mode is selected affects which level is loaded here, and also which message is shown in the warm-up level.
Also i gotta go noe
Now
Cya and gl
have a good night stunnedbyte.
makes sense, figured it'd be different levels
I'm honestly not sure how I would implement it
twisted plains uses conditional map16
what does it do?
it changes map16 based on a condition
you can also set it to add 0x100 to the map16 tile if the flag is set
I made all new ExGFX for those things, but I don't really know how to use Conditional MAP 16. I learned how to use the Remap Direct MAP 16 feature, but not the Conditional one yet.
Wow, that is cool. I've always thought about doing stuff like that, but never knew how.
Are you being rhetorical? Sorry, not trying to backseat, but I am happy to answer if you want me to.
neat, I probably needed that at some point.
Gotcha. I know you can. I just have a hard time telling sometimes. ü§ê
you're allowed to backseat but only if your suggestions are worse than mine Kappa
asm nobody needs: dropped items fly away in random directions.
Do you like my new bounce block graphics? Previously, it was just a big arrow, but I like this new one better.
I never thought of that, lol.
Fair
Wow, I didn't even realize you could d-boost there.
the pencil i'd assume
Wow, never thought of that happening either, ha ha.
That's what makes it fun, ha ha.
They are quite unpredictable and likely glitchy. I made a tutorial at one point for this hack, but removed it. In it, there was a mini puzzle using them.
Wow, I also never knew you could skip one of the Bullet Bills. It is quite entertaining to see all the ways you break my level.
un-remove it, that sound incredible
is that the same jump you did 2 times already
What speed are you playing at?
Yes
lmao
speed is in the top-left corner, 60fps = 100% speed
Oh, I didn't even think of looking. Thanks.
Wow, you made that look so easy, ha ha.
you could if stunnedbyte was still here.
stunnedbyte built a bunch of those muncher ceiling item y-speed cancel jumps.
I put those in to prevent access from the top. I think I forgot the corner one.
I know of one little pointless abuse you could do.
If you hit them from the correct x position above them, you can get them to bounce you straight up.
I don't know. You might be right.
no x speed will give you 80
At the very beginning, on the snake block, where the Bowser statue used to be, where it goes up to the top level, it is easy to do.
A fine line
Possible = intended. Absolutely.
ofc it's a coin snake
asm nobody needs: blocks that rotate mario's speed by 45¬∞.
Wow, impressive. I was wondering if you were going to be able to make it, ha ha.
time to go back down and dupe turn blocks Kappa
This is one of my favorite jumps, in the muncher tunnel.
fork jumps DansGame
How do you make these so easy?
üò±
Yes, but they are still hard for me, ha ha.
50% slowdown, also fork jumps were super common in old hacks.
What are fork jumps?
jumping from a horizontal 1-tile muncher gap into a horizontal 1-tile muncher gap.
i.e. 3 munchers 1 tile appart
which looks like a fork.
with 3 teeth.
3 teeth, the muncher are the teeth
a single 1-tile gap is not a fork jump.
it's just a 1-tile gap.
also things get more visual if the muncher are 2+ tiles high.
I'm having a hard time visualizing what you mean @dacin.
Oh
hFork emote when?
Gotcha, smh.
üî±
what the fuck is that
Hell's Kitchen logo?
a trident apparently but what
it also looked different before i posted it in the chatbox
so gg twitch
right that too
great, next time somebody ask about fork jumps, just post that emote.
then they'll understand.
and then get good y-subpixels and do fast acceleration.
asm nobody needs: you can duck spin jump.
I actually forgot to test spin jumping this jump. Oops.
Actually, I didn't test hitting Kaizo blocks there either.
ü§ê
...wait there's death air?
I thought the point was to jump on the coin blocks.
never mind then.
time to brute force whether you can spin jump the jump Kappa
The invisible blocks are to prevent using the empty space between letters to abuse jumps.
but what if there was spiny ground after the jump.
Since the letters above are not solid.
Spiny ground? Sounds fun.
(it can't be an actual spiny 'cause then the muncher hitbox is different)
but how do you ban ducking?
also, asm nobody needs: overclocked coin snake that moves at 1 block per frame.
would be kinda fun if you have to avoid it while keeping it alive.
This will be interesting if this works, I forgot to test this method.
i.e. a muncher snake that you need to keep alive.
It might be possible to activate only the top right one, or both upper ones.
There you go, nice.
good y-subpixels?
I am no expert, but maybe also correctly utilizing the open/closed hitbox of the munchers above comes into play?
I was told previously they had weird hitboxes on the edges of the munchers.
Ah
@Mapsking ‚Üë asm nobody needs.
there is a lot of asm nobody needs in this stream
ya I need to distract myself from my yoshi puzzle problems.
fair
Yes, some are regular water, some are inversed controls.
please don't break it too bad
yes, imagine if the stuff you abuse all just slowly becomes single use.
the horror!
You can skip most of this section pretty easily with slowdown unfortunately.
yeah I have nightmares of items not spawining in my room due to lacking sprite slots Kappa
big ??
What speed do you need to jump?
gg
Wow, that was a cool ending! Never thought about beating the level that way, ha ha.
good skip
gg
Impressive.
Time to add a muncher wall there!
KappaCool
I only modified things players were normally had potential to hit.
You can also do it from jumping around the first block, and then off of it.
Oh no.
ScaredyCat
...wait a second
something something coin block hitbox.
lmao
LMAO
ah, deep wall jump make it work without abusing the coin hitbox.
If you can enter a block from the right, it should, in theory force you through the wall, and push you to the right.
I already ...-ed you, but I'm not sure if this is even possible.
maybe you always get caught by the body interaction point.
but you're imo also missing 1 idea.
huzzah he found it.
it helps with dying less in the wall.
not sure if that's enough to clip though.
I think the body interaction point just wins so you can't clip.
and that's why armageddon does it to the left :)
What is the difference between left/right here?
should've put an impossible room, too many people cleared it.
pretty sure armageddon already is impossible tbh
Oh, so going through a wall to the left is assisted by the nature of the blocks, but going right through them is working against it?
mario's body interaction point pushes you left when inside a wall, which in particular kills your rightward speed.
Gotcha.
i have judged it to be impossible
i will judge the hack back
What about your idea earlier of going up through the munchers? Seems more likely.
@TheBiob you're just lacking the skill taught by cataclysm.
so, uh, go clear cataclysm.
then the bullets are ez.
I'd never be able to beat a hack like that, ha ha. I can barely beat this one.
and then there's noise who spent xyz hours because he didn't want to pause.
but why learn if you can not
he leared how to triple shell jump, too bad that's not used in armageddon.
he didn't?
_sad_
the triple shell jump is great.
I wouldn't call it super standard.
is it used anywhere except glitch abuse 3?
and nobody played glitch abuse 3, no?
is there?
(inb4 it's in a room I skipped)
oh, it's the room you can bring yoshi into.
(except if you're HF apparently?)
into ‚Üí through
let's see if I still have the gif
sent it on discord.
i don't like the sound of that
do you want it too, biob?
sure
you need to be high enough in the ceiling.
i mean at that point you have blue shell+ yoshi
what else is there
spawn fish, get iframes.
also even just breaking the vertical room would be something.
you can maybe get p-speed and you don't have to wait for the final shell.
ya but who plays all rooms.
Unrelated note, do you think I should still leave the TAS tag on MEL, considering all the breaks you performed?
OK
what does the TAS tag even mean
TAS = suitable for speedruns Kappa
i.e. not a puzzle.
That's weird, I never noticed that.
I will have to test it again.
that sounds like a gimmick Inferi needs.
Well, it never happened when I did it, and I fought the boss many times.
does your score in in 9 right now or something?
I wonder why it happens?
+80 hits whenever Conan gets hit.
my guess is it just doesn't draw over the score while 9D is set or whatever the flag would be
So how do I identify it or fix it?
I don't know asm, but it is irritating.
I could ask Nowieso, he has helped me with this boss.
"learn asm, not hard" or whatever the quote was
@TheBiob You have also helped me. Would you be willing to help me fix it if I send you the boss sprite?
I
I've already fixed tons of other things visually, why not this?
if it can wait until after C3 sure but I want to focus on my own hacks until then
It has been downloaded three times since being submitted.
gg
Maybe I should just add some ASM to disable ending in a 9, ha ha.
Nice job!
ending in a 9 wouldn't be the problem
set the score to the boss' hp's 10s digits
What would the problem be then?
as I said, my guess it it just draws the score while the animations are frozen
i.e. while the powerdown animation plays
yeah I'm not sure how the drawing actually works
of the score I mean, does it draw the entire score every frame? I would assume so but whoknows
if it does draw everything then yeah, that's the most logical explanation
Want me to send it to you to TheBiob?
good
I'm confused, ha ha. Way over my head.
Any problems with it?
@Mapsking eh screw it sure, but if I don't find it immediately I'm gonna put it off
OK, I understand.
OK, thanks for playing it.
turns out the boss is indeed drawing the name every frame, and, if animations aren't locked, does that again but also draws the hp
i hope this is just infinite and pulling from a huge list
aw
are sprites in slots 10/11 not affected by cape smashes?

it's amazing.

so what exactly are we doing?
yes but like, are we just finding them or doing something with it?
i see

ay
